titles.title: Honoring the life and work of Louis Lorenzo Redding, whose lifelong dedication to civil rights and service stand as an example of leadership for all people.
Honoring the life and work of Louis Lorenzo Redding, whose lifelong dedication to civil rights and service stand as an example of leadership for all people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution honors the life and work of Louis Lorenzo Redding.
